title: PMS 2.0 766 - Thursday Night Football Recap, Christian McCaffrey Traded To The 49ers, NFL Week 7 Preview/Picks With AJ Hawk LIVE From The ThunderDome
description: On today’s show, Pat joins AJ Hawk and the boys live from Eugene, Oregon and the set of College GameDay to chat about last night’s Thursday Night Football game between the Saints and the Cardinals, the Cardinals getting a huge win, what’s going on with the Saints, the animosity between Kyler Murray and Kliff Kingsbury, and the massive news that Christian McCaffery has been traded to the San Francisco 49ers, before Pat and AJ go through the entire NFL week 7 slate and make their picks against the spread. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you on Overreaction Monday, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
